npcAchievementText: Backed th' Kickstarter project at th' maximum level!
justinIntroMessage1: Ahoy there! Ye must be a landlubber here. My name's Justin, an' I'll be yer guide in Habitica.
justinIntroMessage3: Great! Now, what're ye interested in workin' on throughout this journey?
justinIntroMessageUsername: 'Fore we begin, let’s figure out what t' call ye. Below ye’ll find a display name an' username I’ve generated fer ye. After ye’ve picked a display name an' username, we’ll get started by creatin' an avatar!
justinIntroMessageAppearance: So how'd ye like t' look? Don’t worry, ye can change this later.
introTour: Here we are! I've filled out some Tasks fer ye based on yer interests, so ye can get started right away. Click a Task t' edit or add new Tasks t' fit yer routine!
mattBochText1: Welcome t' th' Stable! I'm Matt, th' beast master. Startin' at level 3, ye'll find eggs an' potions t' hatch pets with. When ye hatch a pet in th' Market, it'll appear here! Click a pet's image t' add it t' yer avatar. Feed 'em with th' food ye find after level 3, an' they'll grow into hardy mounts.
sleepDescription: Need a break? Check into Daniel's Inn t' pause some o' Habitica's more diff'cult game mechanics:
sleepBullet2: Tasks will no' be losin' streaks
sleepBullet3: Bosses won't do damage fer yer own missed Dailies
sleepBullet4: Yer boss damage or collection Quest items'll stay pendin' 'til check-out
communityGuidelinesIntro: Habitica tries t' create a welcomin' environment fer users o' all ages an' backgrounds, 'specially in public spaces like th' Tavern. If ye've any questions, please consult our Community Guidelines.
acceptCommunityGuidelines: I agree t' follow th' Community Guidelines
welcomeMarketMobile: Welcome t' th' Market! Buy hard-to-find eggs an' potions! Come see what we've t' offer.
howManyToSell: How many wouldye like t' sell?
wrongItemType: Th' item type "<%= type %>" isn't valid.
wrongItemPath: Th' item path "<%= path %>" isn't valid.
unpinnedItem: Ye unpinned <%= item %>! It'll no longer display in yer Rewards column.
cannotUnpinArmoirPotion: Th' Health Potion an' Enchanted Armoire cannot be unpinned.
ianTextMobile: Can I interest ye in some quest scrolls? Activate 'em t' battle monsters with yer Party!
cannotBuyItem: Ye can't buy this here item.
mustPurchaseToSet: Must purchase <%= val %> t' set it on <%= key %>.
notAccteptedType: Type must be in [eggs, hatchingPotions, premiumHatchingPotions, food, quests, gear]
contentKeyNotFound: Key not found fer Content <%= type %>
typeNotSellable: Type isn't sellable. Must be one o' th' followin' <%= acceptedTypes %>
userItemsKeyNotFound: Key not found fer user.items <%= type %>
invalidQuantity: Quantity t' purchase must be a positive whole number.
donateText3: Habitica be an open source project that depends on our users for support. Th' money ye spend on gems helps us keep th' servers runnin', maintain a small staff, develop new features, an' provide incentives for our volunteer programmers. Thank you for your generosity!
paymentYouSentSubscription: Ye sent <%- name %> a <%= months %>-months Habitica subscription.
paymentSubBilling: Yer subscription'll be billed $<%= amount %> ev'ry <%= months %> months.
classGearText: Congratulations on choosing a class! I've added yer new basic weapon t' yer inventory. Take a look below t' equip it!
tourStatsPage: This be yer Stats page! Earn achievements by completin' th' listed tasks.
tourTavernPage: Welcome t' th' Tavern, an all-ages chat room! Ye can keep yer Dailies from hurting ye in case o' illness or travel by clickin' "Pause Damage". Come say hi!
tourPartyPage: Yer crew will hold ye accountable. Invite mates aboard to uncover a Quest Scroll!
tourGuildsPage: Guilds are common-interest chat groups created by th' players, for the players. Browse through th' list an' join th' Guilds that interest ye. Be sure t' check out th' popular Habitica Help: Ask a Question guild, where anyone can ask questions 'bout Habitica!
tourChallengesPage: Challenges be themed task lists created by users! Joinin' a Challenge will add its tasks t' yer account. Compete against other users t' win Sapphire prizes!
tourMarketPage: Startin' at Level 3, eggs an' hatching potions drop randomly when ye complete tasks. They appear here - use 'em t' hatch pets! Ye can also buy items from th' Market.
tourHallPage: Welcome t' th' Hall o' Heroes, where open-source contributors t' Habitica be honored. Whether through code, art, music, writing, or even just helpfulness, they have earned Sapphires, exclusive equipment, and prestigious titles. Ye can contribute t' Habitica, too!
tourPetsPage: This is th' Stable! After reachin' level 3, ye'll gather pet eggs an' hatchin' potions as ye complete tasks. When ye hatch a pet in th' Market, it'll appear here! Click a pet's image t' add it t' yer avatar. Feed 'em with th' food ye find after level 3, an' they'll grow into powerful mounts.
tourMountsPage: Once ye've fed a pet enough food t' turn it into a mount, it'll appear here. Click a mount t' saddle up!
tourEquipmentPage: This is where yer Equipment's stored! Yer Battle Gear affects yer Stats. If ye want t' show diff'rent Equipment on yer avatar without changin' yer Stats, click "Enable Costume."
equipmentAlreadyOwned: Ye already own tha' piece o' equipment
welcome1notes: This avatarrr will represent ye as ye sail through th' seas of Habitica.
welcome2notes: How well ye do on yer real-life tasks will control how well ye do in th' game!
welcome3: Progress in life an' th' game!
welcome3notes: As ye improve yer life, yer avatar will level up and unlock pets, quests, booty, and more!
paymentCanceledDisputes: We 'ave sent a cancelation confirmation t' yer email. If ye don' see thee email, contact us t' prevent future billin' disputes.
paymentAutoRenew: This subscription will auto-renew 'til 'tis canceled. If ye needs t' cancel this subscription, ye kin do so from yer settin's.
paymentSubBillingWithMethod: Yer subscription will be billed $<%= amount %> every <%= months %> months via <%= paymentMethod %>.
